fix.after:
match self.root:
    case None:
        return 1
    case _:
        match (self.left, self.right):
            case (None, None):
                return self.root.value
            case (None, r):
                return r.cal_value() + self.root.value
            case (l, None):
                return self.root.value + l.cal_value()
            case (l, r):
                return l.cal_value() * r.cal_value() + self.root.value
